document_data.name: Undead Battlemight
document_data.mainbody: '''''Undead battlemight''''' was a spell used by priestesses of [[Lolth]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell gave [[skeleton]]s and [[zombie]]s the same mobility as the caster. Both the natural agiltity and speed of the undead creatures were temporarily increased. During casting, the caster had to touch the undead for the spell to take effect.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required [[material component]]s, a single drop of quicksilver, three drops of water and the cartilage or sinew of any mammalian species.
